title: The Queen’s Husband - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Martial Arts   Romance
tags: Ancient China   Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Business Management   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Imperial Harem   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Persistent Love Interests   Politics   Polyandry   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shameless Protagonist   Transmigration   Unlucky Protagonist
author: 青妃意
description:
Crossed over to ancient times after a betrayal. 

The emperor humiliates her, the concubines bully her. The queen doesn’t mind! She was more at ease outside the palace! 

Turning the county mansion into a queen’s hotel, a palace maid into a waitress and guards into respected bodyguards… At night, she counts her silver and laughs out loud as beautiful men are sent to her door to serve enthusiastically. So satisfying!>
